mapper.insert:
insert into charge_item_property ( uuid, charge_uuid, charge_property_key, charge_property_value, del_flag, create_time ) values
( #{chargeItemProperties.uuid}, #{chargeItemProperties.chargeUuid}, #{chargeItemProperties.chargePropertyKey}, #{chargeItemProperties.chargePropertyValue}, #{chargeItemProperties.delFlag}, #{chargeItemProperties.createTime} )
